msContents.summary: The 1915 editio princeps of Caurip Perumāḷ Araṅkaṉ.

lg.l: kaḻaṉi marattu C1 also supports this reading. viḷaintuku tīmpaḻam
kāntaḷ vēli yōṅkumalai naṉṉāṭṭuccelva ṉeṉpavōṅ kalvarai mārpaṉ
yoṇṭoṭi makaḷir vaṇṭa layaruntoṇṭiyaṉṉa veṉṉalan tantu
lāṭarai putaiyak kōṭai yiṭṭavaṭampavir maṇaṟkō ṭūra neṭumpaṉai

body.p:
[itu, talaimakaṉ ciṟaippuṟattāṉākat talaimakaḷ tōḻikkuc
colluvāḷāyc colliyatu.]
[kallāṭaṉār pāṭiyatu.]

(i-ḷ.):― cuṟāmīṉ pāynta puṇ· āṟit tantaiyumkaṭalil (mīṉ
vēṭṭaikkuc) ceṉṟaṉaṉ ; aṉṉaiyum· uppaik koṭuttu nel
laip peṟakkaruti uppuviḷaikaḻaṉiyiṭam ceṉṟaṉaḷ; ātaviṉ, cērp
paṟku ippōḻtu variṉ· eḷiyaḷāvāḷ· eṉṟukūṟum tūtākac,
cēymaiyuḷḷa āṟṟaikkuntu, utavikaḷ· ariyavātalaikkuṟittu
varuntātu, (uṭaṉpaṭṭuk)kēṭpāraippeṟiṉ nallatākum. (e-ṟu.)

lg.l: puṉkā lukāat | tucciṉai yaṉṉa naḷikaṉi yutira
cōrku puvala G1+2, cōrku vavala veṉparko lavarē
niṉṉūr neyta laṉaiyai yemperuma nīyemakkiṉṉā kiyapala ceyyiṉu

body.p:
[itu, alar añci āṟṟāḷ ākiya talaimakaḷ talaivaṉ kēṭpāṉ ākat
tōḻikkuk kūṟiyatu.]
[tumpīmōci kīraṉ pāṭiyatu]

lg.l: nammaṉai maṭamaka ḷiṉṉa meṉmaiccāya laḷiya ḷeṉṉāy
pūṭṭup porucā vumaṇa roḻukait tōṭu niraitta

body.head: mullai.
body.p:
(i-ḷ.):― cēymaiyuḷḷa vaḻiyaik kaṭantu cellōmāṉāl,
periya tōḷkaḷaiyuṭaiyāḷukkuk kāmam mikuntu (ataṉāl,) tuṉ
pam (uṇṭākum) eṉṟu, peritum virumpi niṉaitta maṉattiṉai
yāy, murampiṭam· uṭaiyumpaṭi ceṉṟu kaḷarayuṭaiya pāḻnilaṅ
kaḷiṟ putuvaḻiyai uṇṭākkiya aṟivuḷḷa pāka ! iṉṟu tēraik
koṇarntaṉai ; (ataṉāl,) aḻakiya nōvāl varuntittaṅkumavaḷai
yāṉ talaiyaḷittalāṉ, (avaṭku iṭar) ilatāyiṟṟu. — (e - ṟu.)

murampu - kallirali uyarntirukkum nilam. karampai – pāḻ
nilam. viṉaiyāḷaṉai vēlaiyiṟutiyiṟ pukaḻtaṉ marapātaliṉ, ‘mati
yuṭai......tēr’ eṉṟuṉ. iṭar - mīṇṭuṅkoḷḷappaṭṭatu.
